import React from 'react'; import '../styles/Hive.css' import wordData from '../data.js' import Shuffle from './Shuffle' const Hive = () => { let centerLetter = wordData[0].letters[0] let letters = [...wordData[0].letters] letters.unshift() const shuffle = () => { shuffle(letters) return letters } return(
) } export default Hive
